content: I have a Samsung phone, which I've had for about 2 years now. I use it a lot for social media, email, and texting, and lately, I've been using a new app that I think might be running in the background. My battery usually lasts around 10-12 hours, but it's been draining faster lately. Oh, and I recently got a new phone case, which I really like - it's a transparent silicone one that I bought from Amazon for $15.99.
